Text: Thanks again for the advice! Hopefully it helps move things over at Baltimore
Any time! Always nice to talk shop
Can I call u in 5?
I have a 3pm with AWS to discuss PA DMV…had a quick question
Ok - call u in 1 min

Ok I think I understand what you were saying about pre/post money valuation.

3 years ago we were probably worth about $175m. This group invested in us at maybe a $300m valuation and added say $50m to the balance sheet so now we’re worth double from 3 years ago ($350m)
Does that sound right?
It does
Which is why it threw me off when Jt said “this effectively double our valuation”
How you doin over there buddy? The RMDs are quiet. Wondering what the vibe is other the what I know already
Hey man - I’m good. About to take a couple days off to see the family
I think everyone just assumes nothing will happen
Or that any changes won’t be enough
They stalled the conversations out long enough not to have to pay me more on the $1 mil in deals I closed
How are you doing up there?

What do you mean they stalled stalled long enough… …? Meaning something new in terms of new stalling or not paying you? I thought they squared up with you and you got like $27k or something? They still owe ?
Oh I mean if we had gotten a new comp plan I likely would have gotten more
Neil left in march I think
They paid me fair under the old comp pla

Just Jeff and Theckla were on my leadership due to the board meetings in NYC. He mentioned casually they have a search out for a VP of local gov sales and the candidates they’ve interviewed weren’t what they were looking for. 

I told him I had interest and asked if it was something they were considering internal people for or not and if so, is there a process to let it be known I’m interested. He said he’d have to talk to Phil in HR about that “process” haha. 

He then said JT’s response to me being interested would be along the lines of that I’m “very good” at my job (his words) and that JT and Mike would want me to stay put as an RMD and focus, not be taking in a new role with outstanding pipeline etc etc. 

So basically I learned I was never considered and by having a large long tail / timeline pipeline I’m handcuffed by it if I have any interest in moving up
Yeah that sounds like what I’ve heard across the company. The culture is to hire rather than promote
But we just so everyone get promoted to wearing two hats!
After Neil left
We’ve had 4 heads of marketing and the old deputy directors asked if they would ever be considered and were told no
That’s true
Maybe just on the sales/marketing side
Yeah there were a lot of promotions you’re right
Sorry you didn’t get considered. You would be really good with a team

I’m losing interest in what’s in front of me here especially with it being august and then elections then the holidays. I told Jeff it’s impossible for my lobbyists to get me in person meetings right now unless they are big financial contributors like Dave’s NY lobbyist and that’s it’s frustrating at the moment
I need something to build and look forward to here if I’m gonna stay
Fred Pierce is lining up interviews for me. Great guy. You should hit him up
Ok I will
Need his number?
Yeah that’d be great
I agree on the something to look forward to. I have lots of deals in the pipeline but I still can’t see how to get to $300k
Are there any other new sales leadership roles developing do you know? Jeff said the investment is ear marked heavily for product
Nothing so far. Jeff told me 6 months ago that if we start hitting our numbers there would be a new level of sales leadership as they hire more reps
But since we haven’t I can’t see them doing that yet
I have a call with plunket Friday. I’m gonna make a play I just don’t know what yet
I may just lead with “help me stay at PayIt” after he explains and sees just how pathetic the profit share plan is. That’s what the meeting is for to help bring me clarity there
Let’s go on strike and make signs and walk around our home offices while in camera for internal calls!
Laughed at “Let’s go on strike and make signs and walk around our home offices while in camera for internal calls!”
Yeah I think that makes sense on pushing them
Unless they’re cornered they won’t do anything
I think a couple of the people who got promotions threatened to quit/ found other offers
In order to leverage them into something better here
I spoke to MP
Jeff just called and told me they’re bumping me to $150k base
Boom
That probably doesn’t need board approval bc it’s already the plan
Thanks Steve! Appreciate you pushing
Very happy to hear this
Let’s catch up 1:1 tomorrow gotta run something by you
Ok let’s do it
Hey if you want to catch up in a bit let me know. I’m wrapping up a meeting now
Sorry day got away from me. My flight is 6:15pm so I’m leaving after this talk
Let’s get in touch this week I’ll reach out
No worries. Sounds good and safe travels
Hey man - sorry to hear you’re not feeling well. Rest up and get better soon!
Thanks brotha
How did it go?
Jeff is a stand up guy.
He listened and gave advice first and foremost
Related to my venting and time in life and said he did the same higher risk move when leaving cap advantage and picked PayIt the lower offer bc he needed to accelerate his career
That’s really good. Sounds like he understood you
I was wondering if they were going to counter, but it sounds like you made it clear you were ready to move on
Yea it’s clear cut we agreed on a week for handoff
Jeff just told me. I acted surprised
Congrats on the move man
Thank you!
Hey man - how’s it going? Just thinking about you and wanted to check in
Hey bud. Want to chat tomorrow ?
Absolutely. Let me know when’s good
Tomorrow is flexible. 3pm EST?
Sounds good
Can we do Friday 3pm est instead?
330 Friday?  I Have a call 230-330
Ah I can’t. Tomorrow before 3pm est is wide open
Let’s connect at 11am then!
Tomorrow
Liked “Let’s connect at 11am then!”
I’ll call you then
Hey man! How’s it going?
Hey buddy! It’ss going really well.hows like your way?
I wanted to tell you that Anoka, MN finally came in! They awarded to us after a short RFP. I know you had done some work on it
Things are good. Just hustling trying to change the gov payment space
Nice what was the contract value?
About $350k
Awesome. Your sale I presume ?
No they gave it to Patrick
Psh
And Westland, MI came in as well. They didn’t give that to anyone tho
I know you had really put your heart into your territory so I just wanted to share that you were making an impact
Tho I’m sure you’re making a bigger impact now at the new place
Nice! Westland too. Glad to hear it. Likely a small deal there but nice to see Michigan expanding. So when does Payit send me a check!?
I always like hearing about successes I worked on so thank you
Westland ended up being $250k. So not bad!
I’m sure your stock is skyrocketing
And of course! Your presence is missed at payit. But glad for you in the new gig
I never got a clean answer on my PayIt “equity”…even Phil couldn’t answer if I leave with anything of value.
Thought you had said I did but just dropped it
Yeah you should have ‘something’. Probably not much but at least a years worth of units vested
